short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension can generate QR codes from the URL, selected text or links of the current website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Feature list:
- Generate QR code for the current website URL
- Generate QR code on text selection change
- Generate QR code on hovering links
- Lock current QR code
- Change QR code position
- Fullsize QR code
- Statusbar
